abilities.name: Lord of the Machine Cult
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If that unit has the **ELECTRO-PRIESTS** keyword, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

abilities.name: Dataspike
